query:
SELECT 
  u.email,
  su.supplierId,
  s.companyName,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jobs WHERE assignedSupplierId = su.supplierId) as jobCount
FROM users u 
JOIN supplierUsers su ON u.id = su.userId 
JOIN suppliers s ON su.supplierId = s.id
WHERE u.email = '12@supplier.com'

  su.supplierId,
  s.companyName,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jobs WHERE assignedSupplierId = su.supplierId) as jobCount
FROM users u

JOIN suppliers s ON su.supplierId = s.id
WHERE u.email = '12@supplier.com'
